actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Abdnor. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Approved for reporting without amendment favorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 304.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1567, The Water Resources Development Act of 1985.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1567 (water resources development).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1567, The Water Resources Development Act of 1985.
